name: This is fine (kovalok, borbware)
description:
Game done during Retro Game Jam 2023. Game boy game done with ZGB.

You are a girl trying to get your memory back while avoiding dangerous ghost. Find a memory and locate the exit.

Controls:

Arrow keys: Move

Z: Continue dialog

Credits:

Lassi Niinikorpi - Programming

Natasha Skult - Art and level design

Sara - Character design

Borb - Music
